abstract: Mining group Rio Tinto said a British press report claiming it is talking to banking advisers about a potential $9 billion rights issue in the first half of next year was speculation.
lead_paragraph: Mining group Rio Tinto said a British press report claiming it is talking to banking advisers about a potential $9 billion rights issue in the first half of next year was speculation.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Dismisses Report of $9 Billion Rights Issue
